input.sentences: though we were out in the wilderness everyone there new it was time to party .
i had already found a little friend to accompany me and i am pretty sure he wanted some of the food too .
as i made my way around the table i saw an amazing jumbo being made .
next to it of course was a pile of crayfish and potatoes | true southern comfort .
then there was the boos | you ca n't have all this great food without something to wash it down with .
output.sentences: It was time for my office's annual party, and this year, the theme was having a cookout in the wilderness.
On the day of the party, my friend found something pretty while we were hiking around the forest.
When we came back to the clearing, our coworkers had set up a table to cook on, where there was a jumbo pot full of amazing looking food.
There were truly spicy southern dishes, stew, seafood, and potatoes, among other things.
After we had food to eat, the entire group pitched in to wash the dishes and cookware before going back to the party.
